6.5 Data types

message

Datatype

Type

datatype message =
      BM_GETCHECK |
      BM_GETSTATE | 
      BM_SETCHECK |
      ...

Description

Messages are represented by values of the message datatype. Other groups of options are defined by similar datatypes.
